mapper.select: SELECT REVISIT_ID AS REVISIT_CODE, REVISIT_NAME AS REVISIT_NAME, 1 AS INSERT_USER, '平台管理员' AS INSERT_NAME, 1 AS SUBJECT_ID, 1 AS SITE_ID, EPI.REVISIT_REMARK AS REVISIT_REMARK, EPI.LOCK_FLAG AS LOCK_FLAG, TO_CHAR (EPI.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DATE FROM EPI_REVISIT_INFO epi
SELECT REVISIT_ID AS REVISIT_CODE, TOWN, VILLAGE_ID AS VILLAGE_ID, PATIENT_ID AS PATIENT_CODE FROM EPI_REVISIT_PATIENT

SELECT a1.REVISIT_ID AS REVISIT_CODE, B1.USER_NAME, A1.TOWN, A1.VILLAGE_NAME, A1.MANAGER, A1.IN_DATE, A1.STATE, A1.SUBMITSTATE FROM EPI_REVISIT_ENTRY_AREA a1 LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER b1 ON A1.USER_ID = B1.USER_ID

SELECT a1.REVISIT_ID AS REVISIT_CODE, a1.PATIENT_ID AS PATIENT_CODE, B1.USER_NAME, A1.RESULT, A1.GAST, A1.IS_SIGN, A1.REVISIT_DATE, A1.GAST_DATE, A1.LOST_REVISIT_REASON, A1.IS_USE, A1.TELEPHONE, A1.SUBMITSTATE, A1.USER_ID FROM EPI_REVISIT_RESULT_TEMP a1 LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER b1 ON A1.USER_ID = B1.USER_ID

SELECT a1.REVISIT_ID AS REVISIT_CODE, a1.PATIENT_ID AS PATIENT_CODE, A1.RESULT, A1.GAST, A1.IS_SIGN, A1.REVISIT_DATE, A1.GAST_DATE, A1.LOST_REVISIT_REASON, A1.TELEPHONE, A1.REMARK FROM EPI_REVISIT_RESULT a1
